transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Haan, Divyesh ji, cut gaya tha. Cut gaya tha. Haan, haan, cut gaya tha. Haan, woh network. Divyesh toh bhai jo call back request aaya tha na, woh close kar doon?

Customer: Ab pehle usko block kari tab na woh karenge bataiye. Block toh dekhiye hota kya hai na, block on call hai na? Ek toh aap call laga lenge, woh call karenge na. Ashwan daal dial kar dijiyega on call. Toh permanently block ho jayega woh.

Customer: Yahi tarika hai. Ab sochiye industry leader leke rakha lekin domestic ka ek question nahi mila. Mera paisa toh sab lagbhag lagbhag waste hi chala gaya.

Executive: Dekhiye abhi baat suniye. Agli baar kaise koi himmat banayega aap khud hi soch ke dekhiye.

Customer: Hmm, samajh raha hai. Humko samajh bhi aa raha hai. Time waste bhi ho raha hai. April ab bahut door nahi hai. November aa gaya. December, January, February, March, April, paanch mahine reh gaye hain, chhah mahine. Toh phir se dobara himmat nahi hogi. Main dekhiye aapko abhi se indication de de raha hoon.

Executive: Main samajh raha hoon aapki baat. Koshish toh hum jitna kar paaye hain, sab kiya.

Customer: Abhi kya hai?

Customer: Abhi catalog mein kuch aisa hai nahi ki main tick karu.

Executive: Sab kuch okay hai.

Customer: Ab phir pata nahi kaun call karta hai ki aapki kitni sale ho rahi hai, kitna revenue ho raha hai, kya hai and alag tarike ki question puchti hai. Kaun hai mera relationship manager?

Executive: Relationship manager aapke Kajal hain jo Bilwae bhi the aap se, theek hai?

Executive: Aur main toh dekh hi raha hoon. Baaki ladkiya hain jo dekh rahe hain sab kuch.

Customer: Chaliye koi baat nahi. IndiaMART hamesha thodi market lead karegi.

Executive: Woh baat bhi dhyan rakhiyega.

Executive: Haan, dekhiye hum log jaisa time jitna manage kar rahe hain woh bhi. Suniye na, main bas dekhiye itna dhyan rakhiyega ki agar export customer ho jaate hain, pata nahi hum aap bahut aap bahut zyada din tak aap log lead nahi kar payenge.

Customer: Aur yeh yeh baat samajhne ki koshish kariyega aur jis hisab se feedback hai main khud hi bana ke rakha hoon. Kabhi kisi din mauka mil gaya international matlab pura acche se PR level bahut acche se kar dunga.

Customer: Jitni PR bani sab khatam ho jayegi. Toh please waisa koi mat kariye yaar hum log shanti se kaam karne wale insaan hain. Ya toh humko ek bhi call mat dijiye. Theek hai? Aap log authenticity bhi verify nahi kar rahe hain. Aapke yahan smuggling bhi chal rahi hai.

Executive: Hmm, samajh raha hoon.

Customer: Chal rahi hai ki nahi woh aap vastavikta mein jaante hain. Main usme bolne ki zarurat nahi hai.

Customer: Dekhiye, sab mein kya isse abhi yeh paap ka ghada bharega toh footega. Aur jab footega toh puri duniya janegi.

Customer: Dekhiye jitna kar pa rahe hain, theek hai us tarike se matlab pura koshish. Koi koi company itni bhi badi company nahi hai ki constitution se badh ke manipulation kar sake logo ka. Main samajh raha hoon aapki baat. Main samajh raha hoon.

Customer: Baaki dekhiye jo cheeze handy hai woh hum log kar de rahe hain. Jaise buyer list ke bare mein bola aapne. Usko block kar de rahe hain, theek hai? Process wohi hai, kar lenge usko close. Baaki other cheeze hain already humne discussion kar chuke hain, hai na?

Executive: Theek hai na?

Customer: Mujhe koi bhi cheez yaad dila diya kijiye. Main toh aise hi khali matlab aap hi logo ke sath bata diya kijiye WhatsApp pe.

Customer: Abhi kya yaad dilayenge? Kuch as such aisa kuch raha hi nahi jo na toh ab dekhiye yahi cheez tha toh iske liye ghoom phir ke humko khoj khaj ke aapko call karna pad raha hai. Aap directly jab hum available hai toh phir koi fayda nahi hai. Ab hum jaise ki humne ek solution toh bataya jo mere mere liye jo mujhe bataya gaya ek solution hai iska toh ab bata diya hum koi bhi buyer aaye, phatak se on call khatam kahani ho jayegi. Nahi aayenge us tarah ke buyer. Dobara aayenge nahi. Block seedha hamesha. Ab jo chahe toh aapne block maar diya aur permanently block ho gaya.

Executive: IndiaMART ka insaan nahi hoon.

Customer: Main recorded line pe baat karta hoon. Mujhe malum hai sir aap mil bhi gaye hain. Aap batane ki zarurat nahi hai aapko. Ek ek court mein bas case karunga. Toh smuggling mein jayenge andar aur bahut acche se nap jayenge. Ek aad 100 customer le lunga aur phir uske hisab se main video bana ke daal dunga.

Customer: Toh main woh sari cheeze nahi karna chah raha. Main apna kaam kar raha. Shanti se main apna kaam karu yaar. Aap log apna kaam kar rahe ho. Apna aapki company hai bhai aapko apna aap bhai us company ke liye dedicated ho. Aap apna kaam karo simple that's it. Kisi ko pareshan.

Executive: Sir.

Customer: Hmm.

Executive: Samajh gaya hoon.

Executive: Koi nahi Divyesh ji, ek baar main night mein connect karta hoon aap se, theek hai?

Customer: Nahi, jaane ki connect karne ki koi zarurat nahi hai. Main abhi kahin aur busy hoon. Mera mindset thoda alag hai. Theek hai.

Customer: Main nahi aana chahta is main is kichar mein nahi jana chahta. Meri baat samajhne ki koshish kariye. Theek hai.

Executive: Samajh raha hoon aapki baat, theek hai. Theek hai sir, cooperate kijiye matlab hum log jitna ban paaye karne ki koshish kar rahe hain ki.

Customer: Nahi, yeh sab pata nahi hai. Aur bhi log hain aapke client aap unke sath relation build karenge toh thoda better rahega. Relation response nahi rahega sir.

Customer: Matlab yeh mera aakhri conversation matlab main waise toh mera conversation hi aakhri matlab tha hi matlab woh toh mera main aage chal ke relation waise bhi nahi rakhunga. Hmm.

Customer: Kyunki matlab aisa nahi hai ki main bewakoof hoon sir mere ko lead generate karne nahi aata ya mere ko samajh mein nahi aata ki marketing kaise hoti hai ya campaign kaise run hote hain. Matlab mere ko sari cheeze samajh mein aati hai. Main bas apna kar raha aur kar liya hoon lagbhag lagbhag bas yeh aakhri yeh jo bridge hai jo aapke lead generation ka bridge hai jo aap de rahe hain yeh sari cheeze yeh bas ending hi hai meri taraf se.

Executive: Samajh raha hoon. Main iska zarur dhyan dunga aage.

Customer: Aur koi bhi customers agar honest ke sath yaar aap log client ke sath apne wafadar nahi hai na yaar. Aap loyal nahi hai. Aur matlab aur iske aage bolne ki koi zarurat nahi hai sir. Jahan loyalty na ho wahan insaan nahi rehta hai.

Customer: Aap log paise kamane ke liye kuch bhi kar dete hain. Kisi hadh tak chale jaate hain. Kya bunu main? Incentive incentive banane ke liye bahut bahut sari cheeze hain. Aapko toh aur bhi logo se pata hi chal rahi hongi ki kya chal raha hai, kya nahi chal raha hai. Hum usse batane ki zarurat nahi hai.

Executive: Chaliye.

Executive: Sir, samajh raha hoon sir. Ab already main discuss kar chuka hoon. Aap jo mute karke unmute karte hain yeh bhi main samajhta hoon.

Executive: Mute. Aisa kuch nahi hai sir. Divyesh ji, aap ek minute suniyega main ke haan boliye. Nahi boliye aap. Ek bolde ek bolde suggestion leke ja raha hoon main. Thoda chaliye theek hai. Cooperate aur suniyega Divyesh. I don't have any issue specially personally I don't have any issue but with your company the way the unethical way they've been doing a business that's my problem and my problem is not you. The the way policies you've been designing in your company this is this is exactly the problem. Main aap aap se mera kya hai yaar aap ek acche insaan ho unse pyar se milo yaar main hamesha milunga. Bas yeh hai ki aage chal ke mera IndiaMART se koi relation nahi hai. To be honest bata raha hoon. Ab uske liye ab hamari profile kitna bhi downgrade karna chahe kya fark padta hai. Main toh koi downgrade nahi kar raha sir main jitna best kar raha utna kar paaye hum log. Wahi sharing aur acha kar paaye hai na? But yeh jo kuch outsider activities hai jiski wajah se agar aap bhi naraz hain. Aur main aisa nahi aap kabhi aap kabhi internet aap bas ek jo hai aapke views main dekhta hoon YouTube pe aapke views tak nahi aate main kya bolu aapko. Ab dekhiye sir aap main utna marketing tools mein nahi jaunga but abhi kya hai ki main kya better kar sakta hoon aapke liye jitna bhi woh meri jo bhi responsibility hai woh main itna kariyega ki mere se koi call na aaye aapki company se bas isse zyada. Theek hai. Haan woh main kar raha hoon. Maine aapko guide kiya. Ashwan daaliye aur dobara koi bhi buyer call nahi aayega. Baaki sir ek feedback jayega please mujhe cooperate karna aap usko jo bhi feedback hai bhejo. Aap directly call kar liye jab main available hoon toh aapko mujhe call karna padta hai. Mujhe aapko dhoondh ke call karna padta hai ki haan inki complaint aa rahi hai ya inhone call back request daali hai toh inko bhi. Theek hai sir. Thanks.
summary:
Concerns:

- Domestic leads not received, money wasted.

- Feels IndiaMART may not lead market always.

- Authenticity not verified, smuggling occurring.

- Wants no calls from IndiaMART.

- Dissatisfied with client relations.



Resolution:

- Executive blocked the buyer list.

- Executive assured to take care of the issue.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

smuggling

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, refund, client relations, smuggling
